description: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.
info: For strength heroes, it grants 120 mana, 0.5 mana regen and 0.7% spell damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 120 mana, 0.5 mana regen and 0.7% spell damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 150 mana, 0.63 mana regen, 0.88% spell damage and 10 attack damage.
